features.name: Multi-file upload
features.description: Upload single or multiple files (CSV, Excel) up to 100MB each with UUID-prefixed naming and metadata persistence

backend.notes: Full implementation for CSV and Excel. Multi-file and single file endpoints working. JSON parsing throws 'not yet implemented' exception in FileParserService.java line 122.

frontend.notes: File upload UI implemented with single file upload. Multi-file upload not exposed in UI (only single file input). File accepts CSV and Excel formats.

acceptanceCriteria: Files stored on disk with UUID-prefixed naming
gaps: JSON file parsing not implemented (throws FileProcessingException)
Frontend only supports single file upload, not batch

features.name: Async processing
features.description: Files parsed and analyzed asynchronously after upload with status transitions

backend.notes: Async processing implemented with @Async annotation. Status transitions from UPLOADING -> UPLOADED -> PROCESSING -> PROCESSED/FAILED. AsyncConfig only has @EnableAsync, no custom thread pool configuration despite PRD stating core:4, max:8, queue:100.

frontend.notes: Shows file status badge but no polling for status updates during processing.

acceptanceCriteria: Status transitions: UPLOADING -> UPLOADED -> PROCESSING -> PROCESSED/FAILED
gaps: Custom thread pool configuration missing (should be core:4, max:8, queue:100)
Frontend does not poll for status updates during processing

features.name: Schema detection
features.description: Automatic column type detection across 10+ data types

backend.notes: Full implementation detecting: integer, number, currency, percentage, date, email, boolean, text. Supports multiple date formats. Well-tested with unit tests.

frontend.notes: Schema information not displayed in Files page. useFilePreview exists but schema details not shown.

acceptanceCriteria: Correctly identifies integer, number, currency, percentage, date, email, boolean, text
gaps: Frontend does not display detected schema to users

features.name: File preview
features.description: Preview first N rows of uploaded data

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/files/{id}/preview endpoint working with configurable row count (default 100).

frontend.notes: FilePreviewModal component implemented showing first 10 rows in a table. Eye button triggers preview.

gaps: Frontend hardcodes 10 rows instead of configurable amount

features.name: Schema API
features.description: Retrieve detected schema with sample values, null counts, unique counts

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/files/{id}/schema endpoint working. Returns per-column analytics including detectedType, nullCount, uniqueCount, sampleValues.

frontend.notes: No UI to view schema analysis. Hook exists in services/hooks.ts but not used.

gaps: No frontend UI to display schema analysis results

features.name: Reconciliation creation
features.description: Submit source file, target file, and rule set to start reconciliation

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/reconciliations endpoint working. Returns immediately with PENDING status, processing runs asynchronously.

frontend.notes: 4-step creation wizard implemented with file selection and rule set selection. Wizard has step indicator and validation.

features.name: Key-based matching
features.description: Index records by composite keys from field mappings

backend.notes: indexByKey method implements HashMap-based indexing for O(n) matching performance. Supports composite keys from multiple field mappings.

frontend.notes: N/A - Backend-only feature

acceptanceCriteria: O(n) matching performance using HashMap-based indexing

features.name: Six match types
features.description: EXACT, FUZZY (Levenshtein), RANGE (numeric tolerance), CONTAINS, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH

backend.notes: All 6 match types implemented in compareValues method. Levenshtein distance calculation implemented. Fuzzy threshold and tolerance configurable.

frontend.notes: N/A - Backend-only feature. Match type selection would be in rule creation.

acceptanceCriteria: Each strategy correctly identifies matches according to its algorithm and configured thresholds

features.name: Progress tracking
features.description: Real-time progress percentage (0-100) during execution

backend.notes: Progress updates at: 5% (start), 20% (source parse), 40% (target parse), 90% (matching), 100% (completion). Stored in database.

frontend.notes: Match rate progress bar shown. useReconciliations hook refetches every 5 seconds for IN_PROGRESS status. Progress percentage not displayed directly.

acceptanceCriteria: Progress updates at file parse (20%, 40%), matching (90%), and completion (100%)
gaps: Frontend shows match rate, not processing progress percentage

features.name: Statistical output
features.description: Match rate, record counts, exception counts stored as JSONB

backend.notes: Statistics JSONB field populated with totalSourceRecords, totalTargetRecords, matchedRecords, unmatchedSourceRecords, unmatchedTargetRecords, exceptionCount.

frontend.notes: Table shows records, match rate, exception count. Match rate color-coded (green >= 95%, yellow >= 80%, red < 80%).

acceptanceCriteria: Comprehensive statistics accessible via results endpoint

features.name: Cancellation
features.description: Cancel in-progress reconciliations

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/reconciliations/{id}/cancel endpoint. Sets status to CANCELLED for PENDING/IN_PROGRESS. Does not actually interrupt running async task.

frontend.notes: No cancel button in ReconciliationsPage UI.

acceptanceCriteria: Status transitions to CANCELLED for PENDING/IN_PROGRESS reconciliations
gaps: Does not actually interrupt running async processing
No cancel button in frontend

features.name: Rule set CRUD
features.description: Create, read, update, delete versioned rule sets

backend.notes: Full CRUD implemented. Version auto-increments on update. Cascade operations for field mappings and matching rules.

frontend.notes: Master-detail layout with rule list and detail view. Delete working. Create button has TODO comment, Edit shows button but no implementation, Duplicate shows button but no implementation.

acceptanceCriteria: Cascade delete of mappings and rules
gaps: Create rule set modal not implemented
Edit rule set not implemented
Duplicate rule set not implemented

features.name: Field mappings
features.description: Define source-to-target column mappings with key designation and transforms

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/rules/{id}/mappings endpoint. Supports confidence scores, transform configuration, and key field marking. Transform field exists but transforms not applied during reconciliation.

frontend.notes: Field mappings displayed with source->target arrows and Key badges. No UI to add/edit individual mappings.

acceptanceCriteria: Supports confidence scores, transform configuration, and key field marking
gaps: Transform configurations not applied during reconciliation execution
No UI to add/edit field mappings

features.name: Matching rules
features.description: Define per-field matching strategies with priorities

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/rules/{id}/matching-rules endpoint. Supports tolerance thresholds, fuzzy matching thresholds, priority, and activation control.

frontend.notes: Matching rules displayed with type badge and threshold. No UI to add/edit individual matching rules.

acceptanceCriteria: Supports tolerance thresholds, fuzzy matching thresholds, and activation control
gaps: No UI to add/edit matching rules

features.name: Version tracking
features.description: Rule sets maintain version history

backend.notes: Version field increments on every modification. No historical version storage - only current version maintained.

frontend.notes: Version number not displayed in UI.

gaps: No historical version storage - cannot view/revert to previous versions
Version not displayed in frontend

features.name: Multi-provider support
features.description: Switch between Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT-4o, DeepSeek via config

backend.notes: Spring AI 1.1.2 auto-configuration handles provider selection via spring.ai.* properties. ChatModel interface abstracts provider. All three providers (anthropic, openai, deepseek) are dependencies.

frontend.notes: AI Settings tab has provider dropdown (Anthropic, OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama). Uses mock data - selection not persisted to backend.

acceptanceCriteria: Single app.ai.provider property selects active provider at startup
gaps: Frontend AI provider selection not connected to backend
Runtime provider switching not implemented (requires restart)

features.name: AI field mapping suggestions
features.description: Analyze source/target schemas and suggest mappings with confidence scores

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/ai/suggest-mapping endpoint. Returns JSON with sourceField, targetField, confidence, reason, isKey, suggestedTransform. Parses AI response and handles markdown code blocks.

frontend.notes: No UI to trigger AI mapping suggestions. Would integrate with reconciliation wizard.

acceptanceCriteria: Returns JSON with sourceField, targetField, confidence, reason, isKey, suggestedTransform
gaps: No frontend integration - users cannot trigger AI suggestions from UI

features.name: AI rule suggestions
features.description: Recommend matching rules based on schemas and existing mappings

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/ai/suggest-rules endpoint. Returns natural language response with matching strategy recommendations.

frontend.notes: No UI to trigger AI rule suggestions.

acceptanceCriteria: Natural language response with matching strategy recommendations
gaps: No frontend integration

features.name: AI exception resolution
features.description: Generate actionable resolution suggestions for individual exceptions

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/exceptions/{id}/suggestions endpoint. Suggestions cached in aiSuggestion field to avoid redundant API calls.

frontend.notes: ExceptionCard displays aiSuggestion with sparkle icon. No button to request new suggestion if none cached.

acceptanceCriteria: Suggestions cached in aiSuggestion field to avoid redundant API calls
gaps: No button to manually trigger AI suggestion generation

features.name: Session management
features.description: Create, list, retrieve, and soft-delete chat sessions

backend.notes: Full CRUD for sessions. Sessions can be linked to reconciliations. Soft delete sets active=false.

frontend.notes: Chat messages stored in Zustand store. No session list UI - always creates new session. Session persistence across page refresh not implemented.

acceptanceCriteria: Sessions can be linked to specific reconciliations for contextual awareness
gaps: No session list/history UI
Cannot resume previous sessions
Session not persisted across page refresh (only in Zustand)

features.name: Synchronous messaging
features.description: Send message and receive complete AI response

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/chat/message endpoint. User and assistant messages persisted to database.

frontend.notes: useQuickChat hook calls /chat/message endpoint. Shows loading indicator while waiting.

acceptanceCriteria: User and assistant messages persisted to database

features.name: Streaming responses
features.description: Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream for real-time AI responses

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/chat/stream endpoint returns Flux<String> as text/event-stream. Full response persisted on completion.

frontend.notes: ChatContainer only uses synchronous useQuickChat hook. SSE streaming endpoint exists in backend but frontend does not consume it.

gaps: Frontend does not implement SSE consumer - uses sync endpoint instead

features.name: Contextual awareness
features.description: Chat includes reconciliation context (status, match rate, exceptions) and recent message history

backend.notes: ChatContextService builds system knowledge and dynamic context. buildEnhancedContext includes reconciliation details, recent activity, smart context based on user message, and last 10 messages.

frontend.notes: N/A - Backend-only context building

acceptanceCriteria: Last 10 messages included in prompt context

features.name: Exception types
features.description: MISSING_SOURCE, MISSING_TARGET, VALUE_MISMATCH, DUPLICATE, FORMAT_ERROR, TOLERANCE_EXCEEDED

backend.notes: Enum defines all 6 types. ReconciliationService assigns MISSING_SOURCE, MISSING_TARGET, VALUE_MISMATCH, DUPLICATE during reconciliation. FORMAT_ERROR and TOLERANCE_EXCEEDED not actively used.

frontend.notes: Type filter dropdown. ExceptionCard shows type. mapType function handles backend types.

acceptanceCriteria: Correct type assigned based on discrepancy nature
gaps: FORMAT_ERROR and TOLERANCE_EXCEEDED types not generated by reconciliation engine

features.name: Severity levels
features.description: CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW

backend.notes: Key field mismatches = CRITICAL, missing records = HIGH, value mismatches = MEDIUM. LOW not actively assigned.

frontend.notes: Severity filter dropdown. ExceptionCard has severity-colored border. Summary cards show Critical and Open counts.

gaps: LOW severity not used

features.name: Status workflow
features.description: OPEN -> IN_REVIEW -> RESOLVED / IGNORED

backend.notes: Status transitions tracked. resolvedAt timestamp set when RESOLVED. resolvedBy identity stored.

frontend.notes: Accept/Reject/Investigate buttons. Accept resolves, Reject ignores, Investigate only logs to console.

acceptanceCriteria: Status transitions tracked with timestamps and resolver identity
gaps: IN_REVIEW status transition not implemented in frontend
Investigate action not fully implemented

features.name: Paginated filtering
features.description: Filter by reconciliation, type, severity, status with pagination and sorting

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/exceptions supports all filters. Default page size 20. Configurable sort field and direction.

frontend.notes: Filters for severity, status, type, and search. No pagination controls - loads all filtered exceptions.

gaps: No pagination controls in frontend

features.name: Bulk resolution
features.description: Resolve multiple exceptions in a single API call

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/exceptions/bulk-resolve endpoint. All specified exceptions updated atomically.

frontend.notes: Accept All AI Suggestions button triggers bulk resolve for exceptions with aiSuggestion. No checkbox selection for arbitrary bulk operations.

gaps: No checkbox multi-select for arbitrary bulk operations

features.name: AI resolution suggestions
features.description: Get AI-generated resolution guidance per exception

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/exceptions/{id}/suggestions endpoint. Suggestions cached after first generation.

frontend.notes: aiSuggestion displayed if present. No button to request suggestion generation.

gaps: No UI button to trigger suggestion generation

features.name: Aggregate metrics
features.description: Total/completed/pending/failed reconciliations, overall match rate

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/dashboard/metrics returns complete dashboard state including all counts and overall match rate average.

frontend.notes: 4 StatsCards showing Total Reconciliations, Match Rate, Open Exceptions, In Progress. useDashboardMetrics hook fetches data.

acceptanceCriteria: Single API call returns complete dashboard state

features.name: Exception analytics
features.description: Open vs. resolved counts, breakdown by type and severity

backend.notes: exceptionsByType and exceptionsBySeverity maps returned with type/severity keys and count values.

frontend.notes: MatchRateChart built from exceptionsByType data. Not a true trend chart over time.

acceptanceCriteria: Maps returned with type/severity keys and count values
gaps: Chart shows exception breakdown, not match rate trend over time

features.name: Recent activity
features.description: Last 10 reconciliations with summary details

backend.notes: recentReconciliations list ordered by creation date descending, limited to 10.

frontend.notes: RecentReconciliations component displays list with status badges and View Details action.

features.name: Resource counts
features.description: Total uploaded files and rule sets

backend.notes: totalFilesUploaded and totalRuleSets included in metrics response.

frontend.notes: File and rule set counts not displayed on dashboard.

gaps: Frontend does not display file and rule set counts

features.name: Data source CRUD
features.description: Create, read, update, delete data source configurations

backend.notes: Full CRUD implemented. Supports FILE, DATABASE, and API types via DataSourceType enum.

frontend.notes: Data Sources tab shows mock connections. Add Connection button present but uses mock data. Not connected to backend DataSource API.

acceptanceCriteria: Supports FILE, DATABASE, and API types
gaps: Frontend uses mock data, not connected to backend API

features.name: Connection testing
features.description: Test connectivity to configured data sources

backend.notes: POST /api/v1/datasources/{id}/test endpoint. performConnectionTest has TODO comments for DATABASE and API types - returns true without actual test.

frontend.notes: Test button present for each connection but updates mock state, not backend.

acceptanceCriteria: Records test timestamp, success/failure, and error details
gaps: DATABASE and API connection tests not implemented (always return true)
Frontend Test button not connected to backend

features.name: Type filtering
features.description: List data sources filtered by type

backend.notes: GET /api/v1/datasources?type=DATABASE query parameter filtering implemented.

frontend.notes: No type filter in Settings Data Sources tab.

gaps: No type filter in frontend

features.name: Dashboard Page

backend.notes: N/A - Frontend page

frontend.notes: Full implementation with welcome banner, 4 KPI cards, chart, recent reconciliations list, and quick action buttons. Connected to backend via useDashboardMetrics.

backend.notes: N/A - Frontend page

frontend.notes: Full chat interface with message bubbles, file upload integration, quick-start prompt suggestions, loading indicator, error banner, auto-scroll. Uses sync endpoint, not SSE streaming.

features.description: File upload, searchable file table, file preview modal, delete functionality

backend.notes: N/A - Frontend page

features.description: Master-detail layout with rule set list and detail view showing field mappings and matching rules

backend.notes: N/A - Frontend page

features.description: 6-tab settings panel: Profile, Data Sources, AI Settings, Notifications, Security, Appearance

backend.notes: N/A - Frontend page

frontend.notes: 6-tab panel implemented with all UI elements: Profile form fields, Data Sources connection list with test button, AI Settings provider selector (Anthropic/OpenAI/DeepSeek/Ollama) with API key and feature toggles, Notifications toggle switches, Security password/2FA/sessions, Appearance theme/language/date format.

features.name: Multi-tenancy
features.description: All data scoped to organization; default org auto-created on startup

No organization management or switching

features.name: Global error handling

frontend.notes: ApiError class handles error responses. Pages show error states with AlertCircle icons.
